message: Hello. My name is Alex. Thank you for reaching out to PlaySure Gaming. How can I assist you today?
Hi, I placed a multi-bet, and I want to know if I can cash out some of my winnings early without closing the whole bet?

I completely understand your concern. Let’s run through security so I can take a look at your account and provide accurate information. Can you confirm your name, email, and also confirm your date of birth?
Sure, my name is Rachel Adams, my email is rachel.a@example.com, and my date of birth is September 9, 1993.

Thanks, Rachel. That's all correct! You can cash out your multi-bet early if the 'Cash Out' option is available for your bet. Partial cash-out allows you to withdraw a portion of your winnings while keeping the rest of your bet active.
Nice! How do I check if my bet is eligible for a partial cash-out?
You can check this by going to the 'My Bets' section in your account. If partial cash-out is available, you’ll see a cash-out option along with a slider to adjust how much you'd like to withdraw.
Great! And does cashing out early affect my remaining bet in any way?
Cashing out early does not affect the remaining bet; it continues to run with the adjusted stake. However, the cash-out value is determined by the current odds at the time of cashing out.
Got it! I’ll check my bets now and see if I can cash out.
You're very welcome, Rachel! I'm glad I was able to help. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
